comments.body: We temporary don't use the source from pypi, since there are missing files in the source distribution, see https://github.com/nion-software/nionswift/pull/333.
Several other projects have this same problem: `nionswift-instrumentation`, `nionswift-eels-analysis`, `nionswift`. I have committed fixes so that they are fixed in the next release for each.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +10,14 @@  #url: "https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz"
  #sha256: 1f0aae216af499bf0c4e6e2571bd37d53ee75096866fa4266c9014d6d31fffb5
  url: https://github.com/nion-software/nionswift/archive/{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 6e7fa18c7fe146492bc08d7b849e3c9907a8959709ff609825298e5f57fdc8bf

comments.body: Please remove commented out lines or add explanations

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +9,13 @@  #Use pypi for the next release, source distribution missing files
  #url: "https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz"
